casebody.data:
SUMMERS
v.
FOX 2018-0959 Supreme Court of Ohio. July 11, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULING

The Ohio Department of Rehabilitation and Correction shall file a response to respondents' emergency motion for order to produce documents no later than Monday, July 15, 2019. The parties shall file any evidence they intend to present no later than Monday, July 22, 2019.
